statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.PersonType , AA.PersonName , AA.EngName , AA.Email , AA.PhoneNo1 , AA.PhoneNo2 , AA.FaxNo , AA.ImageUrl
, M1.Name as PersonTypeName
FROM dbo.TPerson AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PersonType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'PersonType' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.PersonName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.EngName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Email LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.PhoneNo1 LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.PhoneNo2 LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.FaxNo LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.PersonType , AA.PersonName , AA.EngName , AA.Email , AA.PhoneNo1 , AA.PhoneNo2 , AA.FaxNo , AA.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TPerson AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TPerson ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, PersonType, PersonName, EngName, Email, PhoneNo1, PhoneNo2, FaxNo, ImageUrl ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #PersonType#, #PersonName#, #EngName#, #Email#, #PhoneNo1#, #PhoneNo2#, #FaxNo#, #ImageUrl# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TPerson SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, PersonType = #PersonType# , PersonName = #PersonName# , EngName = #EngName# , Email = #Email# , PhoneNo1 = #PhoneNo1# , PhoneNo2 = #PhoneNo2# , FaxNo = #FaxNo# , ImageUrl = #ImageUrl# WHERE ID = #ID#

UPDATE dbo.TPerson SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ImageUrl = #ImageUrl# WHERE ID = #ID#
